Customer management module with CRUD operations for customer data
Policy management module with CRUD operations for insurance policies
Claims management module with CRUD operations for insurance claims
Data browsing interface for viewing customer, policy, and claims information
User authentication and authorization system for secure access
Data analysis dashboard with visualization capabilities
Reporting engine for generating various insurance business reports
Interactive charts and graphs for data representation
Frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs
Backend API server connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema design for customers, policies, and claims entities
Search and filtering functionality across all data modules
Responsive web interface with whitesmoke background and dark cyan themed elements
Concurrent development setup with npm run dev starting both frontend and backend
Package.json configuration with install:all script for simultaneous FE and BE installation
